title: Distribution of foods
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food handling

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food - Preservation
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Marketing channels

description: Studies the technological advances made in the methods of preserving and transporting foodstuffs, showing their relation to the distribution of perishable foods on a world scale, the flow of foods from producer to consumer, the problems which a limited family income raises, and the international trade and tariff barriers.
